title: Emoji Watch Face
summary: Emoji Watch Face for Android Wear
description: Make your clock smile with the Emoji Watch Face for round and square Android Wear watches.FEATURES:★ Date and Day information★ 12/24 auto-format★ High Resolution Design★ Ambient (dimmed) mode★ Support for Round and Square watchesINSTRUCTION:1. Install Watch Face2. Wait a minute2. Go to Android Wear Application3. Choose Emoji Watch Face4. Enjoy!The emoji watchface has been tested on Moto® 360, LG® G Watch R, ASUS® ZenWatch, Sony® SmartWatch and other. Any problems? Please email me and I'll try my best to fix any issues you have!
descriptionHTML:
Make your clock smile with the Emoji Watch Face for round and square Android Wear watches.

FEATURES:

★ Date and Day information
★ 12/24 auto-format
★ High Resolution Design
★ Ambient (dimmed) mode
★ Support for Round and Square watches

INSTRUCTION:

1. Install Watch Face
2. Wait a minute
2. Go to Android Wear Application
3. Choose Emoji Watch Face
4. Enjoy!

The emoji watchface has been tested on Moto® 360, LG® G Watch R, ASUS® ZenWatch, Sony® SmartWatch and other. Any problems? Please email me and I'll try my best to fix any issues you have!
comments: Nice watch It's a really nice watch, but the seconds do not move when the screen is dimmed. Also, maybe you can add notifications on the dimmed screen. I'm using Xperia Z3
I love it! It will be better if it have animated emojis! Please add some animation effect!
Love this!!!! Very original face. My new favorite!!!!!! Perfect as is, but animations or interactive features would be cool :)
